subject: Economy
topic: Rajasthan ki Arthvyavastha: Krishi, Udyog aur Seva Kshetra
question_en: What is the main source of income for Rajasthan?
question_hi: राजस्थान के मुख्य आयात क्या है।
explanation_en: The main source of income for Rajasthan is the Service Sector, as it contributes significantly to the state's economy through various services including tourism, government services, and private sector services.
explanation_hi: राजस्थान के मुख्य आयात राजस्थान का सेवा कामयाबाद है, ज्ञान और राजनी सेवाओं कामयाबाद, राजस्थान का सफ्रांस
राजस्थान का सेवा कामयाबाद है, ज्ञान और राजनी सेवाओं कामयाबाद, राजस्थान का सेवा कामयाबाद, ज्ञान और राजनी सेवाओं कामयाबाद

question_en: What is the main source of economy in Rajasthan?
What is the main source of economy in Rajasthan?
explanation_en: The main source of economy in Rajasthan is mainly based on government services, tourism, and industrial development.
question_en: What is the main source of economy in Rajasthan?
explanation_en: Rajasthan's economy heavily relies on government services, tourism, and industrial development. Agriculture is also an important sector, but it contributes less to the state's overall economy compared to the above-mentioned sectors.
explanation_hi: राजस्थान के क्रिकरणीय सेवाओं aur इस कामयाबाद
